display_long_description:
Lethal Monk redirects the norm for a Virtual Reality terror experience. It has elements of a fast-paced movement system like Gorilla Tag mixed with the horrific tension whilst in a spooky environment.

This fan-created adventure takes the player through horrible circumstances, with few areas lit up, leaving the player alone to navigate down black hallways, through vine-covered Ruins and Catacombs, with nothing but the movement of the player to battle with the evil stalking from the shadows.

The evil known only as the Monk is a true Imp, and will fill you with terror until you die of fright. You will feel it. Creeping, and watching your every move. If you are not fast enough, it will catch you. Unlike other POV horror titles, Lethal Monk adds to the continuous feeling and builds this feeling of dread through tension—make sure that you are careful and move in a way that uses the environment to your advantage.

All sounds need to be heard—take note there are no dumb My Adventures. Every sound, every choice matters, as you are alone in this experience, and will feel each second of panic as you crawl through tight tunnels or jump between shattered Pillars, surrounded by nothing. You will experience the true terror of the survival experience, and you will never forget that!
